items.title: Global trends, foreign investors key drivers for markets this week: Experts
items.description: Stock markets had a record-breaking rally last week, largely driven by the US Federal Reserve's rate cut

items.title: Overseas funds pile money into Indian stocks again as bull run extends
items.description: The surge in inflows is also a sign of investors' growing comfort with India's equity valuation

items.title: FPIs pump Rs 33,700 cr in Indian equities in Sept amid US rate cut
items.description: Foreign Portfolio Investors put in a net investment of Rs 33,691 crore into equities this month (till September 20)

items.title: Mcap of 6 of top-10 most valued firms jumps Rs 1.9 trn; Infosys tumbles
items.description: The combined market valuation of 6 of the top-10 most valued firms jumped Rs 1,97,734.77 crore last week, with ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank emerging as the biggest winners
